meanings.definition: A person who revives or brings back to life.
meanings.sent1: The talented magician was known as a skilled resurrectionist, able to bring a dead bird back to life.
meanings.sent2: The ancient legend spoke of a powerful sorcerer who was a renowned resurrectionist, capable of resurrecting fallen warriors.
meanings.sent3: At the circus, the clown jokingly referred to himself as a resurrectionist, claiming he could bring laughter back to life.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words acted as a resurrectionist, reviving his spirits after a long and tiring day.
meanings.sent5: The sun rising in the morning sky seemed like a resurrectionist, bringing light and warmth back to the world.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who believe in the resurrection of the dead.
meanings.sent1: The small community of believers gathered every Sunday as resurrectionists, sharing their faith in life after death.
meanings.sent2: The ancient civilization was known for its group of resurrectionists, who held ceremonies to honor their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The children playing make-believe pretended to be resurrectionists, imagining they could bring their toys back to life.
meanings.sent4: The music festival attendees felt like resurrectionists, coming together to celebrate the rebirth of live music.
meanings.sent5: The garden blooming in spring was a sight that made the villagers feel like resurrectionists, witnessing new life after the cold winter.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the practice of stealing corpses for medical research.
meanings.sent1: The dark alley was rumored to be frequented by resurrectionists, who sold stolen bodies to underground labs.
meanings.sent2: In the olden days, stories of resurrectionists roaming graveyards spread fear among the townsfolk.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children teased each other, pretending to be resurrectionists sneaking around the cemetery.
meanings.sent4: The shadows cast by the moonlight made the trees look like resurrectionists, reaching out for unsuspecting passersby.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the abandoned mansion made it seem like a place where resurrectionists would hide their ghastly deeds.
